meanings.definition: Extremely clean or free from dirt or contaminants.
meanings.sent1: The hospital room was ultraclean, with everything sparkling and germ-free.
meanings.sent2: She always keeps her kitchen ultraclean, wiping every surface meticulously.
meanings.sent3: The ultraclean lab was so spotless that even the dust particles were scared to settle down.
meanings.sent4: His ultraclean record in honesty made him stand out among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The ultraclean windows allowed the sunlight to flood the room, making it feel fresh and bright.

meanings.definition: To clean something thoroughly or completely.
meanings.sent1: She decided to ultraclean the garage before organizing it.
meanings.sent2: After the party, they had to ultraclean the house to remove all the confetti.
meanings.sent3: He promised to ultraclean the car, but ended up just giving it a quick wash.
meanings.sent4: The team had to ultraclean the equipment to ensure it was ready for the next game.
meanings.sent5: The maid was instructed to ultraclean the guest room for the VIP visitor arriving.
